abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", { "or" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((-75.67383 6.32076,-84.99023 22.11109,-104.61182 28.16895,-108.54492 17.81669,-86.92383 6.14602,-75.67383 6.32076))", "Geometry POLYGON((132.71484 -8.74394,110.21484 -21.60637,113.02734 Xenopus laevis (Daudin, 1802)", "TaxonKey is Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862)", "TaxonKey is Crinia glauerti Loveridge, 1933", "TaxonKey is Ranoidea australis (Gray, 1842)", "TaxonKey is Chiromantis xerampelina Peters, 1854", "TaxonKey is Austrochaperina pluvialis (Zweifel, 1965)" ] }, { "not" : { "and" : [ "Year is greater than or equal to 2015", "CoordinateUncertaintyInMeters is not null", { -24.226,31.0776 -23.7978,30.5708 -23.7978))", "Geometry POLYGON((31.4648 -24.976,31.4648 -25.421,31.9451 -25.421,31.9451 -24.976,31.4648 -24.976))" ] }, { "or" : [ { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is Agalychnis callidryas (Cope, 1862)", "CoordinateUncertaintyInMeters is less than or equal to 232" ] }, { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is Dendrobates auratus (Girard, 1855)", "CoordinateUncertaintyInMeters is less than or equal to 532" ] }, { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is Xenopus laevis (Daudin, 1802)", "CoordinateUncertaintyInMeters is less than or equal to 31" ] }, { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is Chiromantis xerampelina Peters, 1854", "CoordinateUncertaintyInMeters is less than or equal to 108" ] } ] } ] } } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Albury Wodonga Nature Map 1 records from City of Sydney Council Fauna Sightings 1 records from Southern Highlands Nature Map 1 records from Animal Sound Archive 1 records from Anfibios de un sector del cerro Tacarcuna-Chocó, en el marco del proyecto Colombia BIO- 2017 1 records from Database of Australasian Vertebrate Occurrences 1 records from Macquarie University Biodiversity and Conservation Student Observations 1 records from MSB Amphibian and Reptile Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Caracterización de Fauna para el plan de Etnodesarrollo de Bahía Cupica, Chocó 1 records from Littlewood Species List 1 records from ECOLINC: BIODIVERSITY OF THE WESTERN VOLCANIC PLAINS SIGHTINGS 1 records from UTEP Herpetology (Arctos) 1 records from CM Herps Collection 1 records from Northern Territory WildWatch 2 records from ACT BioBlitz 2 records from Anfibios y reptiles de las regiones Chimalapas (7) y bosque de coníferas y BMM de Veracruz (11) 2 records from Paleobiology Database 2 records from Logan City Council Species Sightings 2 records from Rapid Assessment Program (RAP) Biodiversity Survey Database 2 records from Apoyo a las colecciones biológicas de la Facultad de Ciencias de la UNAM: Fase 1 (MZFC_HE) 2 records from Apoyo a las colecciones biológicas de la Facultad de Ciencias de la UNAM: Fase 1 (Herpetológica) 2 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Amphibian and Reptile Collection 2 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 3 records from UTEP Herpetology Osteology (Arctos) 3 records from Caracterización ecológica de reptiles presentes en los bosques subxerofíticos de Unguía, Chocó 3 records from Borror Lab of Bioacoustics (BLB), Ohio State University 3 records from Museo de Historia Natural Universidad de Caldas -
